rows.name: description_text
rows.value:
Close eyes and relax.

Think of your family life before you started your journey with this app.
       
Think back on skills you learned:
* Self-care
* One-on-one time
* Praise
* Positive instructions
* Managing stress
* Family budgeting
* Rules
* Calm consequences
* Problem solving
* Teen safety
* Dealing with crisis

Reflect on the journey â€“ how was it for you to:
* Share ideas and experiences
* Reflect on and learn from the stories
* Practice skills with your teen

Did anything change for you and your family?

What do you need to continue to use skills?
